scenario.name: SIP_OPTIONS
scenario.send: OPTIONS sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:[remote_ip]> From: "NG911 Test" <sip:+12025551212@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 OPTIONS Contact: sip:+12025551212@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
